title: 21: S4E21 – "Out of the Shadows" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Randomrooroo, Tyler Ouellette, Ryan Peacock, and EverhartofDarkness, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about fearsome figures, ominous obsessions, perilous plans, and oceanside oddities. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s4e21
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
